name: CONTRA: EVOLUTION
description:
The Contra is back!

Contra: Evolution is the first official version of Contra for iOS, bringing all the action of the original 1988 shooter with 21st century graphics and controls in the palm of your hand.
Bill “Mad Dog” Rizer and Lance “Scorpio” Bean have returned to active duty fighting aliens in the forests of South America. Can you survive one of the toughest games ever? Collect specials, unlock new levels and characters, and take on challenges in this blast of arcade nostalgia. With updated HD graphics and future compatibility with iOS 7, get ready for an all-new Contra experience!
